name: bluera-marketplace
description: Claude Code plugin marketplace for Bluera Inc

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:finish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:finish
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:finish
scripts.release:finish: git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
